plot: A lonely man, lost on an Italian's coast full of garbage and excrement, is recovering the bodies of immigrants shipwrecked on the beach.
title: Un consiglio a Dio
plot_es: A lonely man, lost on an Italian's coast full of garbage and excrement, is recovering the bodies of immigrants shipwrecked on the beach.
plot_en: A lonely man, lost on an Italian's coast full of garbage and excrement, is recovering the bodies of immigrants shipwrecked on the beach.
